items.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Your access will continue until the end of your current billing period.

items.question: What is a POD commercial license?
items.answer: POD stands for Print-on-Demand. This license allows you to sell the worksheets you create on platforms like Teachers Pay Teachers, Etsy, or any other marketplace.

items.question: Can I switch between plans?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan anytime. When upgrading, you'll only pay the difference. Downgrades take effect at your next billing cycle.

items.question: Can I try before I buy?
items.answer: Yes! Start with our Free tier which includes the Word Search generator with watermark. It's perfect for testing our platform before upgrading to a paid plan.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express). All payments are securely processed through Stripe.

items.question: Can I create worksheets in different languages?
items.answer: Yes! Our platform supports 11 languages: English, German, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, Dutch, Swedish, Danish, Norwegian, and Finnish.

acceptance.title: 1. ACCEPTANCE
acceptance.content: By accessing LessonCraftStudio, you agree to these terms. If you disagree, do not use our service.

serviceDescription.title: 2. SERVICE DESCRIPTION
serviceDescription.content: LessonCraftStudio provides educational worksheet generation tools through subscription tiers: Free (limited), Core (expanded), and Full Access (unlimited).

intellectualProperty.title: 6. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
intellectualProperty.content: Platform and tools remain our property. User content remains yours. Generated content licensed per subscription terms.

termination.title: 7. TERMINATION
termination.effect: Termination ends access; content license continues per terms

disclaimers.title: 8. DISCLAIMERS
disclaimers.suitability: No warranty of fitness for purpose

limitationLiability.title: 9. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
limitationLiability.content: Maximum liability: fees paid in last 12 months. No liability for indirect, consequential, or punitive damages.

indemnification.title: 10. INDEMNIFICATION
indemnification.content: You indemnify us against claims arising from your use, content, or violations.

governingLaw.title: 11. GOVERNING LAW
governingLaw.content: Swedish law governs. Stockholm courts have jurisdiction. EU consumer rights preserved.

changes.title: 12. CHANGES
changes.content: We may modify terms with notice. Continued use constitutes acceptance.

grantOfLicense.title: 1. GRANT OF LICENSE
grantOfLicense.intro: LessonCraftStudio grants you a license to use generated content based on your subscription:
grantOfLicense.freeTier: Free Tier: Personal, non-commercial educational use only
grantOfLicense.coreBundle: Core Bundle: Commercial educational use within your institution
grantOfLicense.fullAccess: Full Access: Unrestricted commercial use including POD and resale

intellectualProperty.title: 2. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
intellectualProperty.content: You own your original content. We retain rights to platform elements. Generated content is licensed per Section 1.

commercialDistribution.title: 4. COMMERCIAL DISTRIBUTION
commercialDistribution.pod: Print-on-Demand Rights: Full Access subscribers may sell unlimited copies through POD platforms.
commercialDistribution.digital: Digital Distribution: All tiers may distribute digital versions per their license scope.

termination.title: 5. TERMINATION
termination.content: We may terminate for breach with 30 days notice. Content created during valid subscription remains licensed.

warrantyDisclaimer.title: 6. WARRANTY DISCLAIMER
warrantyDisclaimer.content: Service provided "AS IS" without warranties. We do not guarantee suitability for specific purposes.

limitationOfLiability.title: 7. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
limitationOfLiability.content: Maximum liability limited to fees paid in preceding 12 months.

governingLaw.title: 8. GOVERNING LAW
governingLaw.content: Governed by Swedish law. Disputes resolved in Stockholm courts.

modifications.title: 9. MODIFICATIONS
modifications.content: We may modify terms with 30 days notice. Continued use constitutes acceptance.

introduction.title: 1. INTRODUCTION
introduction.content: This policy explains our data practices under GDPR and Swedish law.

dataRetention.title: 7. DATA RETENTION
dataRetention.content: Account data: Duration of account plus 1 year. Logs: 90 days. Marketing: Until opt-out.

dataSecurity.title: 9. SECURITY
dataSecurity.content: Industry-standard security including encryption, access controls, and regular audits.

children.title: 11. CHILDREN
children.content: Service for educators/parents. No collection from children under 16.

international.title: 12. INTERNATIONAL TRANSFERS
international.content: Data stored in EU/EEA. External transfers use Standard Contractual Clauses.

changes.title: 13. POLICY CHANGES
changes.content: Updates notified via email. Continued use constitutes acceptance.

faq.metaKeywords: FAQ, worksheet generators help, pricing questions, commercial license, technical support

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Everything you need to know about LessonCraftStudio worksheet generators

items.general: [{"question":"What is LessonCraftStudio?","answer":"LessonCraftStudio is a comprehensive platform offering 33 professional worksheet generators for teachers and educational publishers. Create custom worksheets with themed images, multiple languages, and commercial licensing options."},{"question":"Who is LessonCraftStudio for?","answer":"Our platform is designed for teachers, homeschool parents, educational publishers, and content creators who sell on platforms like Teachers Pay Teachers, Amazon KDP, Etsy, or their own stores."},{"question":"Do I need design skills to use the generators?","answer":"No! Our generators are designed to be user-friendly. Simply input your content, choose your settings, and generate professional worksheets in minutes."},{"question":"Can I try before I buy?","answer":"Yes! Start with our Free tier which includes the Word Search generator with watermark. It's perfect for testing our platform before upgrading to a paid plan."}]
items.apps: [{"question":"How many worksheet generators do you offer?","answer":"We offer 33 different worksheet generators covering math, language arts, puzzles, games, visual perception, fine motor skills, and more."},{"question":"What's included in the Free tier?","answer":"The Free tier includes access to our Word Search generator with a watermark. It's perfect for testing our platform before committing to a paid plan."},{"question":"What apps are in the Core Bundle?","answer":"The Core Bundle includes our 10 most popular apps: Word Search, Image Addition, Alphabet Train, Coloring Pages, Math Worksheets, Word Scramble, Find and Count, MatchUp Maker, Drawing Lines, Picture Bingo, and Sudoku for Kids."},{"question":"What additional apps do I get with Full Access?","answer":"Full Access gives you all 33 apps, including specialized tools like Code Addition, Cryptograms, Pattern Worksheets, Treasure Hunt, Shadow Match, Prepositions, and 16 more unique generators."},{"question":"How many image themes are available?","answer":"We offer 100+ themed image collections including animals, food, holidays, seasons, transportation, occupations, and educational themes."},{"question":"Can I create worksheets in multiple languages?","answer":"Yes! Our platform supports 11 languages: English, German, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, Dutch, Swedish, Danish, Norwegian, and Finnish."},{"question":"Can I customize the worksheets?","answer":"Absolutely! Each generator offers customization options including difficulty levels, grid sizes, number of items, color schemes, and more."}]
items.pricing: [{"question":"How much does LessonCraftStudio cost?","answer":"We offer three tiers: Free ($0 - Word Search with watermark), Core Bundle ($15/month or $144/year), and Full Access ($25/month or $240/year). Annual plans save you 20%."},{"question":"Can I try before I buy?","answer":"Yes! Start with our Free tier which includes the Word Search generator with watermark. It's perfect for testing our platform before upgrading to a paid plan."},{"question":"Can I switch plans anytime?","answer":"Absolutely! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Upgrades are prorated, and downgrades take effect at your next billing cycle."},{"question":"What payment methods do you accept?","answer":"We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express). All payments are securely processed through Stripe."},{"question":"Can I cancel my subscription?","answer":"Yes, you can cancel anytime from your account settings. You'll retain access until the end of your current billing period, and there are no cancellation fees."},{"question":"Do you offer refunds?","answer":"We don't offer refunds for partial billing periods. However, we encourage you to use our Free tier to ensure the platform meets your needs before subscribing."},{"question":"Is there a discount for annual plans?","answer":"Yes! Annual plans save you 20% compared to monthly billing. Core Bundle is $144/year (vs $180), and Full Access is $240/year (vs $300)."}]
items.technical: [{"question":"What file formats can I export?","answer":"All generators export to high-quality PDF and JPEG formats, perfect for printing or digital distribution."},{"question":"Do the generators work on mobile devices?","answer":"Yes! Our generators are fully responsive and work on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices through your web browser."},{"question":"Do I need to install any software?","answer":"No installation required! LessonCraftStudio is entirely web-based. Just log in to your account from any device with an internet connection."},{"question":"Are my worksheets saved?","answer":"You can download your generated worksheets. We recommend saving them to your device or cloud storage for future use."},{"question":"What if I encounter a bug or issue?","answer":"Contact our support team at support@lessoncraftstudio.com. Core Bundle users receive standard support, while Full Access users get priority assistance."},{"question":"Are there any usage limits?","answer":"No! Create unlimited worksheets with your subscription. There are no daily or monthly generation limits."}]
items.commercial: [{"question":"What is the POD commercial license?","answer":"POD (Print-on-Demand) commercial license allows you to sell worksheets you create on platforms like Teachers Pay Teachers, Amazon KDP, Etsy, or your own store. It's included with Core Bundle and Full Access plans."},{"question":"Can I sell worksheets I create with the Free plan?","answer":"No, the Free plan is for personal, non-commercial use only. To sell worksheets, you need either the Core Bundle or Full Access plan."},{"question":"Can I use the worksheets in my classroom?","answer":"Yes! All plans, including Free, allow use in your own classroom or homeschool setting."},{"question":"Can I share worksheets with other teachers?","answer":"With Core Bundle and Full Access, you can sell worksheets on marketplaces. For free sharing within your school, check with your institution's policies on commercial licenses."},{"question":"Do I need to credit LessonCraftStudio on worksheets I sell?","answer":"No attribution is required on worksheets created with Core Bundle or Full Access plans. Free tier worksheets include a watermark."},{"question":"Can I use the images in other projects?","answer":"The commercial license applies only to complete worksheets generated through our platform. Individual image extraction or use in non-worksheet projects is not permitted."},{"question":"What if I cancel my subscription—can I still sell existing worksheets?","answer":"Yes! Worksheets created during an active subscription period retain their commercial license even after you cancel."}]
